deepTalks.text: {player1}, what's a belief you held strongly 5 years ago that you've completely changed your mind on?
{player1}, what's something you pretend to like but secretly don't? Group guesses first.
Everyone share one thing you're actually insecure about. No jokes allowed. Realest answer gets to give out 2 drinks.
{player1}, what's the most expensive mistake you've ever made?
{player1} and {player2}, share your honest first impressions of each other.
Everyone answer: what's one thing you wish you could tell your younger self?
{player1}, what's a compliment you've received that you still think about?
Go around: say one genuine thing you appreciate about the person to your left.
{player1}, what's something you've never told anyone in this room?
Everyone share: what's your biggest 'what if' in life?

wouldYouRather.text: {player1}: Would you rather know when you're going to die or how you're going to die?
{player1}: Would you rather be famous and miserable or unknown and happy?
{player1}: Would you rather have everyone you know read your search history or your DMs?
{player1}: Would you rather relive the same day forever or never be able to remember yesterday?
{player1}: Would you rather be stuck in a room with your ex or all your exes' new partners?
{player1}: Would you rather everyone know your salary or your body count?
{player1}: Would you rather never use social media again or never eat your favorite food again?
{player1}: Would you rather be rich and alone or broke with your soulmate?

hotTakes.text: {player1}, share a hot take. If anyone agrees, they drink with you. If no one agrees, you drink alone.
Hot take round! Everyone shares an unpopular opinion. Group votes on the coldest take - that person drinks.
{player1}, give us your most controversial food opinion. If it's not controversial, you drink.
{player1}, share a hot take about dating in our generation. Agree = drink with them.
Debate time! {player1} picks a topic, {player2} argues FOR it, {player1} argues AGAINST it. Group decides winner.
{player1}, say something nice about someone everyone hates (celebrity, politician, whatever). Mean it.

confessions.text: Confession time: {player1}, what's the most unhinged thing you've done for a crush?
{player1}, confess to something you got away with. We won't judge. Much.
Anonymous confession: everyone texts {player1} a secret. They read them aloud and guess who said what.
{player1}, what's the worst lie you've told someone in this room?
Go around: confess to a time you were the toxic one in a relationship.
{player1}, what's something everyone here thinks about you that isn't true?
Truth circle: everyone has to answer honestly. {player1} asks one yes/no question to the group.
{player1}, what's the most embarrassing thing in your camera roll? Describe it or show it.

appreciation.text: {player1}, give {player2} a genuine compliment. No sarcasm allowed.
Go around and say what you admire most about the person to your right. Keep it real.
{player1}, what's your favorite memory with someone in this room? Share it.
Everyone toast to something or someone. Best toast gives out 3 drinks.
{player1}, say something you've always wanted to tell {player2} but never have.
